description: Echoing US protests, people call for justice for Adama Traor¨¦, who died in 2016 in police custody.
title: Adama Traor¨¦: French anti-racism protests defy police ban
title_page: Adama Traor¨¦: French anti-racism protests defy police ban - BBC News
maintext: "Today we are not just talking about the fight of the Traor¨¦ family. It is the fight for everyone. When we fight for George Floyd, we fight for Adama Traor¨¦," his sister, Assa, told the protest, according to AFP.
